name: 2 For 2: Connect the Numbers Puzzle
description:
WARNING! You will absolutely get addicted to this 2 for 2 puzzle game.

The object of 2 for 2 is to connect the numbers. DON’T run out of moves!

Make lines by connecting as many same numbered dots as you can. The longer the line, the more points you get and the longer you’ll survive in this 2 for 2 game.

As you connect the same numbers, they add up in multiples of 2.

Ready, set, connect!
Get addicted to 2 for 2.
